title: Facebook : annual revenue 2009 to 2019
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and lastly slightly increasing from 2012 to 2016.
The line significantly increased by 1197.0 from Year 2009 to 2010, and lastly, increased by 1737.0 from Year 2010 to 2011.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 27638.0 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 777.0 was reached at Year 2009
